Name: Epic Jump!
About the game: Epic Jump! is a 2D platform game, where you will have to jump from platform to platform on many different hand-built levels with different challenges. Jump your way through ice, desert, lava, and much more levels to reach the top and unlock the next level. Do all this solo or invite a friend to play local multiplayer (still in development). This game recreates the old nostalgic games we all used to play in a more modern way, to bring back the slow yet joyful experience video games used to give us. Join our discord at R4ptor Studios for daily updates and be part of the community!
